description: Celtic boss targets new winger as Brazilian clubs vie for Scottish champions' left-back.
title: Internacional cannot afford to keep Bernabei
title_page: Internacional cannot afford to keep Bernabei - Scottish gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Internacional have until next week to agree on a deal to sign on-loan Alexandro Bernabei from Celtic but have no chance of meeting the Â£7m price tag, which could open the door for Brazilian rivals Palmeiras. (Record), external
Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers has made signing a new winger his top January priority, having been linked with Antwerp's Michel-Ange Balikwisha and Mohammed Fuseini of Union Saint-Gilloise. (Scottish Sun), external
Hearts striker James Wilson has no regrets over snubbing a move to England, with Liverpool and Manchester United as well as both Celtic and Rangers previously credited with an interest in the 17-year-old. (Record), external
Aberdeen have submitted a bid for Grasshoppers' Latvia defender Kristers Tobers, 24. (Not the Old Firm), external
Willie Miller encourages his former club Aberdeen to target experienced defenders in the January transfer window. (Press and Journal - subscription), external
